problem.markdown:
A stage can be defined as:
(x) A set of operations that can be done without materialization ( ) A set of operations that require materialization ( ) A set of operations that are carried out after materialization

multiplechoiceresponse.p: A stage can be defined as:

choicegroup.choice: A set of operations that can be done without materialization
A set of operations that require materialization
A set of operations that are carried out after materialization
